subject: Lacrosse
College Athletics
Sex Crimes
lead_paragraph: The Duke president, Richard H. Brodhead, who in April canceled the team's season after a woman accused three players of rape, said the men's lacrosse team would be reinstated, with strict stipulations.
snippet: The Duke president, Richard H. Brodhead, who in April canceled the team's season after a woman accused three players of rape, said the men's lacrosse team would be reinstated, with strict stipulations.
